name: coquettish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
trying to attract attention by pretending to be sexually interested in someone, in a pleasant but not serious way: She greeted him with a coquettish smile. She is a fresh-faced, coquettish, giggly girl. See
coquette
More examplesFewer examplesShe's using her coquettish act to persuade him of something against his better judgement.She was watching him with a coquettish expression.The woman cast a coquettish glance at Adam over her shoulder.
